message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to purchase this valuable product from me. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. As such, I'm willing to offer it to you for $950,000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure I'll be able to match this price in the future.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm hoping to get a better price.  I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a better price, but I'm still very confident in the value of this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $900,000. This is a fair price considering the product's worth to you, and I'm not sure I can go any lower.
